description:
Bing Search app does more than find answers on the internet. Save money with Bing Rewards and Bing Offers. Keep up with trending stories, news, and images. Save the daily homepage photos to use as your Wallpaper or Lock screen, and sync them to Bing Desktop.

Real Photography
•	Enjoy beautiful daily homepage images and download them to customize your phone’s lockscreen and wallpaper.
•	Swipe to the left from the homepage to view previous days’ images in case you missed them.

Save Money
•	Sign in to begin earning Rewards for the searches you do in the app (US residents only), and redeem them for gift cards and other prizes.
•	Browse deals and offers around you with Bing Offers (US residents only).

Search Trends
•	See what’s trending across News, Searches, and Images with quick access from the home button.
•	Shake your phone to discover a trending story.

Simple and fast browsing
•	Start with the search box and switch between Recent tiles to manage multiple searches. Remove a Recent tile by swiping it off the screen to the left or right; close all Recent tiles from the top of the list to start over (doesn’t clear your search history).
•	Sync your bookmarks across Bing search apps and sync your images/screenshots to Bing Desktop.
•	Share what you find with your friends on Facebook and Twitter, or via email and SMS.
•	Toggle Private Search in Settings to search and browse without saving your history.

Maps
•	Explore shops, restaurants and other places with ratings, prices, and other detailed information.
•	Get walking, driving, and transit directions with current traffic conditions.

*Some features are not available in all countries.
trackCensoredName: Bing Search - images, news, videos, and trends on the web
